name: df-fg
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2
body: |- wceq(cfg, cmpo(s0, s1, universe, cfv(cfbas, cv(s0)), crab(s2, cpw(cv(s0)), wne(cin(cv(s1), cpw(cv(s2))), emptycls))))
comment: Define the filter generating function. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 3-Sep-2009.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 11-Jul-2015.)
